name: Pirate Treasure!
description:
Pirate Treasure is a puzzle game filled with legendary riches and ancient treasures. Gather more fortune than any pirate in their lifetime.

Play through an exciting story mode containing 60 challenging levels in three different game modes. Also challenge yourself and your friends in an endless mode in a looting competion and see who gets ranked highest in the highscore listing.

Features:
- Story mode
- Two themes: Caribbean and the Far East
- Endless mode
- In total over 60 levels in four game modes
- Dozens of different treasures to collect
- Highscore system
- Original artwork
- High quality audio
